plot: Bosko the woodsman spurns cutting down trees and plays music instead. The trees and animals dance and make their own music.
title: The Tree's Knees
plot_es: Bosko the woodsman spurns cutting down trees and plays music instead. The trees and animals dance and make their own music.
plot_en: Bosko the woodsman spurns cutting down trees and plays music instead. The trees and animals dance and make their own music.
